// PIN创建请求表单 import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; const CreateRequestForm = ({ onClose, onSubmit }) => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', category: '', description: '', location: '', urgency: 'medium', expectedDate: '', expectedTime: '', volunteersNeeded: 1, contactMethod: 'phone', additionalNotes: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); try { // 模拟API调用 await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500)); // 创建请求对象 const newRequest = { id: Date.now(), ...formData, status: 'pending', createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), viewCount: 0, shortlistCount: 0 }; onSubmit(newRequest); onClose(); } catch (error) { console.error('创建请求失败:', error); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; return (

创建新的求助请求
